name: Untilted Puzzle Game
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

A girl of an unknown name is trying to reach her boyfriend. Unfortunately the boy is cursed and whenever she is trying touch him he vanishes in a thin air. The only way to get rid of it is to keep trying and to not lose hope.

The game only supports keyboard input device, there is no controller support.

The game has been released for a special occasion and it is very unlikely it will ever be updated.

CREDITS

https://freesound.org/people/Soundholder/sounds/425368/ - ambient sound
https://freesound.org/people/Mrthenoronha/sounds/518305/ - end game sound
https://freesound.org/people/Jofae/sounds/361636/ - hook shot sound effect

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack - Kenney RPG Urban Pack
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-ui-pack - Kenney Pixel UI Pack
